# Pharmastackx - Health-Tech Marketplace

This is a modern health-tech marketplace for medications and pharmaceuticals with the following features:
- Business portal for pharmacies to upload products (single/bulk CSV)
- Customer interface to browse medications by proximity
- Order placement and delivery system
- Material-UI with dark green and magenta color scheme
- Location-based services for finding nearest pharmacies

## Project Structure
- Frontend: Next.js with TypeScript and Material-UI
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: JWT-based auth system
- File Upload: Support for CSV and other file types

## Development Guidelines
- Use Material-UI components with custom dark green (#1B5E20) and magenta (#E91E63) theme
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Follow healthcare industry best practices for data handling
- Ensure secure authentication and authorization
